text: Baron Giacomo de Martino was the Envoy of Italy to the United States during the regime of Benito Mussolini. (in Italian) On January 23, 1927 he traveled to Chicago, and spent several days touring the city addressing the Italian community and explaining Fascism. == References == Category:Italian diplomats Category:Italian nobility Category:1868 births Category:1957 deaths
title: Giacomo De Martino
